name: Cozyware
description:
Cozyware Warmth Edition

Made in 72 hours for Mini Jam 124: Warmth

HAVING TROUBLE RUNNING IN THE BROWSER? TRY ANOTHER BROWSER OR DOWNLOAD FOR DESKTOP BELOW!

It's a cold and snowy outside so what better time than to setup the perfect warm and cozy night for yourself? Complete several microgames to increase your warmth level before the night gets too late!

Controls:

Mouse
